name: Advent Calendar
description:
Discover a surprise behind each house!


1) Knock on doors to find the house on today's date

2) Discover a quote on creativity and design

3) Light up your Christmas village day after day by opening every door!

4) Interact with the weather, turn on the Christmas lights or choose the "full moon" mode


You can also change the surprises and adapt the calendar as you want, be creative!
